context_analysis.energy_patterns: Energy level 7/10 indicates good capacity for focused work. Weekend context suggests more flexibility and lower stress environment.
strategic_priorities: Clean house before Hunter returns at 10pm

reasoning.scheduling_strategy: Front-load echo development work in the morning before golf (6am-9:30am) to capitalize on fresh energy. After golf, use afternoon for household tasks and meal planning. Evening available for additional echo work if energy permits. Build in buffer time for golf prep and travel.
reasoning.energy_optimization: Start with high-focus echo development when energy is fresh. Golf provides active recovery mid-day. Schedule cleaning and shopping for post-golf when physical activity is beneficial. Reserve evening for lighter echo tasks or relaxation.
reasoning.priority_sequencing: 1) Echo dev (morning focus), 2) Golf commitment (fixed), 3) House cleaning (must complete before 10pm), 4) Meal planning and shopping (afternoon), 5) Additional echo work if time/energy allows
reasoning.recovery_planning: Golf serves as active recovery and social break. Post-golf activities (cleaning, shopping) maintain movement without high cognitive load. Evening allows flexibility - can continue echo work or rest based on energy levels.

schedule.title: echo | MVP Development Sprint
schedule.note: Prime morning hours for completing echo project setup and MVP progress. 3.5 hours of focused development.

schedule.title: personal | Golf Prep & Travel
schedule.note: Get ready, gather golf gear, and drive to course (30 min away)

schedule.title: personal | Warm-up at Golf Course
schedule.note: Arrive early for proper warm-up before tee time

schedule.title: personal | Golf with Jacob Smyle
schedule.note: 18 holes with Jacob, including social time

schedule.title: personal | Travel Home & Quick Lunch
schedule.note: Drive home and grab a quick bite

schedule.title: personal | Meal Planning
schedule.note: Plan meals for the week and create shopping list

schedule.title: personal | Grocery Shopping
schedule.note: Shop for weekly groceries based on meal plan

schedule.title: personal | House Cleaning
schedule.note: Focus on office tidying and bathroom cleaning for Hunter's return

schedule.title: personal | Dinner & Unwind
schedule.note: Prepare and enjoy dinner, decompress from the day

schedule.title: echo | Evening Development Session
schedule.note: Continue echo work if energy permits, or relax if needed. Flexible based on how you feel.

schedule.title: personal | Welcome Hunter Home
schedule.note: Be ready to greet Hunter, catch up on her trip

key_insights: 3.5 hours of morning focus time allocated for echo MVP before golf commitment
All household tasks scheduled for completion well before Hunter's 10pm arrival
Golf provides natural break and energy reset mid-day
Evening echo session is optional based on energy levels after active day
Schedule allows flexibility while ensuring all commitments are met
